channel.title: Shard Master Classic - WIP
channel.description:
Heavily inspired by RuneScape Classic, Shard Master Classic is a game that I hope to actually "finish."
Written on top of my engine, Envel II, this game offers graphical capabilities that RuneScape Classic could not offer at its time such as shadows, textured landscape, perspective correct texture mapping, slightly higher resolution, and 3D walls.
There is no click-move style of gameplay in Shard Master Classic, movement is done with WSAD.
[spoiler=old pics][img]http://i64.tinypic.com/30xj3fr.png[/img] [img]http://i64.tinypic.com/1445tl1.png[/img]
[/spoiler][font=verdana] [img]http://i65.tinypic.com/64401l.png[/img] [size=78%] [img]http://i67.tinypic.com/14jvj3q.png[/img] Lots of stuff here in this update
Message box Items / Inventory Fixed collision World interaction Item dropping Memory usage cut down and game runs faster due to graphical cutbacks :p
[url=http://www.mediafire.com/download/hbpnuz6by4634j7/ShardMasterClassic_inv_witem_obfs.jar]http://www.mediafire.com/download/hbpnuz6by4634j7/ShardMasterClassic_inv_witem_obfs.jar[/url]
EDIT: forgot to mention that to drop an item you have to right click it[/size][/font]

item.title: Shard Master Classic - WIP
item.dc:creator: @killa_kronic killa kronic
item.description:
@killa_kronic wrote:

[quote=“Miss Silabsoft, post:199, topic:553958”][quote author=killa kronic link=topic=672880.msg4506801#msg4506801 date=1460144487]

I read all the comments. Some of you guys need to shut up and let this guy carry on with his work. If you don’t like it then tough. Go on a different thread. This guy is working on something different and he likes what he is doing. The knowledge he posses right now is helping him create this pile trash. (Joking!)

I personally like it. Basic yet it has more room for work and the fact that it looks very simple really makes me happy (idk why)

I’m just saying if you don’t like his work then go on a different thread. The community here is just bad, even if you are giving him advice on how to/where to improve. You guys were abusing his work.

Limits try as hard as you can. At the end of the day what counts is what you prefer. If you like it then go ahead. As long as you put your mind and heart towards it you will achieve what you want.

I like it by the way (:

shut the fuck up, how about if you don’t like reading criticism you can go to another thread, or maybe turn your computer off and put it in your microwave

I pissed my pants reading this. Half of it was saying how bad his game engine is or how he ripped his codes lol.

Edit: Love your comment by the way but I didn’t do anything bad. The community here is bad… All I did was told him to concentrate on his work. No need to get angry
[/quote]
psst its a single player game, you don’t have to kiss ass to get mod :)[/quote]

Who said anything about mod?

Read full topic

item.title: Shard Master Classic - WIP
item.dc:creator: @justaguy justaguy
item.description:
@justaguy wrote:

[quote=“Limits, post:197, topic:553958”][quote author=sini link=topic=672880.msg4506814#msg4506814 date=1460161070]
why does it look like runescape classic ?
[/quote]
my coder dev partners wrote a new game engine stolen from jagex and we are currently using that to make graphics. We are 100% legit 11 year old devs with 2 days of java exp looking for dedicated devs who are cool with working 26 hours a day for $2 an hour and cake on my birthday.[/quote]

Read full topic
